name: 2018- 9th International Conference on Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering ICMAE
content: Conference official website：http://www.icmae.org Meeting time：July 10-13, 2018 Meeting place：ELTE Faculty of Informatics, Lagymanyosi Campus, Eotvos Lorand University, 1/C. Pazmany Peter setany, Budapest-1117 /Hungary,Budapest Published by：After a careful reviewing process,all accepted papers with registration and presentation will be published in IEEE conference proceeding,and reviewed by the IEEE conference publication program for IEEE Xplore,EI Compendex and Scopus. Paper Submission: June 07, 2018 Submission instructions： 1.Prospective authors anr invited to submit original,high quality papers which is original and has not been submitted and published elsewhere 2.Manuscripts should be at least 4 full pages and at most 10pages. 3.The reviewing process of the ICMAE conference aims to provide authors with constructive feedback in their papers,eveb when a submission is rejected.All submissions will be subjected to double-blind peer reviews,who are expert or hace been experiencing in the related field for years.The accepted papers must be revised,taking into consideration the referees’ comments and suggestions,before inclusion in the conference proceedings. Conference Contact: Renne Gao mailbox: secretary@icmae.org phone:+86 18108245450
